subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tim Henman announced yesterday that he would retire after playing one last time at Wimbledon — next month, when Britain plays Croatia in a Davis Cup playoff at the All England Club.The 32-year-old Henman, who reached four Wimbledon semifinals but has not won a Grand Slam title in his 14-year career, said a sore back and a bad knee led to his decision.
